findings.message:
SmartBillions.addHashes (smart_billions.sol#672-689) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(hashFirst == 0 && _sadd > 0 && _sadd <= hashesSize)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
SmartBillions.addHashes (smart_billions.sol#672-689) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(hashFirst == 0 && _sadd > 0 && _sadd <= hashesSize)
SmartBillions.betOf (smart_billions.sol#513-535) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (player.value == 0) || (player.blockNum <= 1) || (block.number < player.blockNum) || (block.number >= player.blockNum + (10 * hashesSize))
	- hash == 0x1000000
findings.name: incorrect-equality

	- (player.value == 0) || (player.blockNum <= 1) || (block.number < player.blockNum) || (block.number >= player.blockNum + (10 * hashesSize))
	- hash == 0x1000000

SmartBillions.won (smart_billions.sol#540-591) uses a dangerous strict equality:

	- hash == 0x1000000
